content: 2-in-1 HDI Short version Setting tool for HDI anchors with an integrated SDS Plus (TE-C) stop hammer drill bit ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Accessories for fasteners- - - ### FEATURES:Features Drill holes precisely to the desired depth No need to change tools – drilling and setting can be done with the same tool Up to 50% faster than the traditional method (overhead hammering) – increasing productivity Large rubber grip for easier handling Drilling and setting with one tool Applications Installation of Hilti HDI short drop-in anchors for fastening pipes, air ducts and suspended ceilings Installation of Hilti HDI-P short drop-in anchors for fastening sprinkler systems, HVAC fixtures, plumbing and electrical components and suspended ceilings in hollow core panels, precast plank and post-tensioned slabs ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-C (SDS Plus) Base material: Reinforced concrete, Concrete Working mode: Hammer drilling Technical Data | Connection end | TE-C (SDS Plus) | Base material | Reinforced concrete, Concrete | Working mode | Hammer drilling | Head shape | Multi Cutter | Head material composition | Tungsten carbide ### ITEMS- 2112765 - Set tool & Drill Bit Combo HDI-P 1/2 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDI-P/HDI-P TZ 1/2 Setting tool assy - 2112761 - Setting tool HDI-P 1/4 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDI-P 1/4 Setting tool assy - 2112763 - Set tool & Drill Bit Combo HDI-P 3/8 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDI-P 3/8 Setting tool assy - 2417737 - HDI-P TZ ¼” 2-in-1 Setting Tool - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDI-P TZ 1/4 Setting tool assy - 2204112 - AUTO SETTING TOOL HDI-P TZ 3/8 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDI-P TZ 3/8 Setting tool assy
